com.korotkevich.provider.repository

Interface Repository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - incoming parameter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientAccountRepository, PromoRepository, ServicePlanRepository, UserRepository

    public interface Repository<T>
    Declaration of layer that interacts with data storage
    Author:
    Korotkevich Kirill 2018-05-10

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T item)
      Adds entity to data storage
      java.util.List<T> query(Specification specification)
      Searches data according to incoming specification
      void remove(T item)
      Removes data frome data storage
      void update(Specification... specifications)
      Updates data in data storage

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(T item)
  throws RepositoryException
        Adds entity to data storage
        Parameters:
        item - incoming item
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if problems occured while adding item

      • update

        void update(Specification... specifications)
     throws RepositoryException
        Updates data in data storage
        Parameters:
        specifications - incoming Specification which describes interaction with data storage
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if problems occured while updating item

      • remove

        void remove(T item)
     throws RepositoryException
        Removes data frome data storage
        Parameters:
        item - incoming item
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if problems occured while removing item

      • query

        java.util.List<T> query(Specification specification)
                 throws RepositoryException
        Searches data according to incoming specification
        Parameters:
        specification - incoming Specification which describes interaction with data storage
        Returns:
        list with items according to specification
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if problems occured while searching item
